fields.label: Pitanje
fields.description: Opcionalni tekst za pitanje. (Pitanje može biti tekst, slika ili oboje)

fields.label: Odgovor
fields.description: Odgovor (Rješenje) za kartu. Use a forward slash / to split alternative solutions. Use \/ if a solution should contain a /.

fields.label: Slika
fields.description: Opcionalna slika za kartu. (Pitanje može biti tekst, slika ili oboje)

semantics.label: Početni tekst
semantics.description: Početni tekst, dostupne varijable: @card i @total. Primjer: 'Karte @card od @total'

semantics.label: Obavezno je učešće korisnika, prije nego rješenje bude prikazano
Text for the answer input field
Text for number of correct
semantics.description: Tekst za rezultat, dostupne varijable: @score i @total. Primjer: '@score od @total tačno'

semantics.label: Pazi na velika i mala slova
semantics.description: Uneseni tekst mora biti tačan i precizan kao odgovor.

semantics.label: Incorrect text for assistive technologies
semantics.default: Netačan odgovor. Tačan odgovor je bio @answer
semantics.description: Text that will be announced to assistive technologies. Use @answer as variable.

semantics.label: Correct feedback text for assistive technologies
semantics.description: Text that will be announced to assistive technologies when a card is answered correctly. Use @answer as variable.

semantics.label: Card change for assistive technologies
semantics.description: Text that will be announced to assistive technologies when navigating between cards. Use @current and @total as variables.

semantics.label: Randomize cards
semantics.description: Enable to randomize the order of cards on display.
